channel.title: GodzRSPS || Looking for developers! 667
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/fIWvS33.gif[/img] WHERE NOOBS BECOME LEGENDS!
===========================
What would Server developer be working with? You will be working with fixing dupes, adding basic suggestions and yeah so on
What exactly would the Server developer needs to do?: Well, they need to fix bugs/dupes or some shizzle like some basic suggestions add stuff and so on.
What will the graphic designer do?: Well, he's going to make design for us, and also lead the graphic section on forums.
What will the Forum developer do?: Well, they are going to install hooks, fix bugs and basic forum stuff and also clean forums.
^ Need to have experience with IPB and stuff (Will test you)
===============================
Fill in this application
Name?: Age?: Country? Timezone? Hours available per day: Skype (Pm me it) What job do you want to apply for (server developer, graphic designer or forum developer)?: Why do you want to join the development team?: (leave this blank, if you are not gonna join development team) Show your graphic design(Leave this blank, if you aren't going to apply for graphic designer) What you good at?: Anything else you would like to add?: //////////////////////////////////////////////
Server Developer roster (0/3) Still opened Still opened Still opened
Forum Developer roster (2/2) Taken Taken
Server graphic designer (0/3) Still opened Still opened Still opened
IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS PLEASE PM ME! ;) =============================================[/center]

item.title: GodzRSPS || Looking for developers! 667
item.dc:creator: @Brooklynn Brooklynn
item.description:
@Brooklynn wrote:

Name?: Kai
Age?: 16
Country? England
Timezone? GMT
Hours available per day: Right now , whenever (unless im sleeping) however only in the evenings soon as i have college.
Skype (Pm me it)
What job do you want to apply for (server developer, graphic designer or forum developer)?: GFX
Why do you want to join the development team?: (leave this blank, if you are not gonna join development team)
Show your graphic design(Leave this blank, if you aren’t going to apply for graphic designer) Many of this stuff is old and I’ve only ever designed stuff for YT. But i can still make good stuff if you have an idea of what you want. http://brooksy0.deviantart.com/gallery/
What you good at?: First of all, im quite good at communicating with teams, I take friendly approaches with players and team members in order to get loads of stuff done without any conflicts. I have also devved a few RSPS’s in my time. I was a former ex-dev @ tizenX before it became famous. I wouldn’t say I am the best graphic designer as i do it more for a hobby, but i try my hardest in all of my work.
Anything else you would like to add?: I think i’ve included everything Thanks for reading my application .

Read full topic
